/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street, filled with cars and buses, stretches out ahead, creating a dynamic and vibrant atmosphere. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the otherwise concrete jungle. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
